sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.USAGE_YR AS USAGE_YR ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD AS MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.USAGE_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS USAGE_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.USAGE_AMT,0),'9,999,999,999,990')) AS USAGE_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.PEEK_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS PEEK_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_01_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_01_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_02_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_02_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_03_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_03_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_04_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_04_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_05_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_05_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_06_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_06_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_07_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_07_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_08_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_08_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_09_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_09_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_10_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_10_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_11_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_11_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_12_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_12_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_01_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_01_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_02_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_02_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_03_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_03_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_04_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_04_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_05_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_05_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_06_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_06_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_07_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_07_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_08_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_08_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_09_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_09_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_10_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_10_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_11_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_11_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_12_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_12_AMT ,T1.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM FROM ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.USAGE_YR >= #sStartUsageYear#
AND T1.USAGE_YR <= #sEndUsageYear#
AND T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #sMngFeeFcltyCd#
ORDER BY T1.USAGE_YR ASC ,T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM ASC ) S ) T
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F SET USAGE_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#usageQy#,',','')),0) ,USAGE_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#usageAmt#,',','')),0) ,PEEK_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#peekQy#,',','')),0) ,MT_01_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt01Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_02_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt02Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_03_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt03Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_04_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt04Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_05_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt05Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_06_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt06Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_07_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt07Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_08_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt08Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_09_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt09Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_10_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt10Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_11_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt11Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_12_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt12Qy#,',','')),0) ,MT_01_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt01Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_02_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt02Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_03_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt03Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_04_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt04Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_05_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt05Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_06_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt06Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_07_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt07Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_08_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt08Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_09_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt09Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_10_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt10Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_11_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt11Amt#,',','')),0) ,MT_12_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mt12Amt#,',','')),0) ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USAGE_YR = #usageYr# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #mngFeeFcltyCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F WHERE USAGE_YR = #usageYr# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #mngFeeFcltyCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.USAGE_YR AS USAGE_YR ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD AS MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.USAGE_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS USAGE_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.USAGE_AMT,0),'9,999,999,999,990')) AS USAGE_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.PEEK_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS PEEK_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_01_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_01_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_02_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_02_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_03_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_03_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_04_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_04_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_05_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_05_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_06_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_06_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_07_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_07_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_08_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_08_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_09_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_09_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_10_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_10_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_11_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_11_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_12_QY,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_12_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_01_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_01_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_02_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_02_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_03_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_03_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_04_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_04_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_05_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_05_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_06_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_06_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_07_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_07_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_08_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_08_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_09_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_09_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_10_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_10_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_11_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_11_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MT_12_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS MT_12_AMT ,T1.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM FROM ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE) WHERE T1.USAGE_YR = #usageYr# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #mngFeeFcltyCd#

SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0),'999,999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_COUNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T1.USAGE_QY),0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS SUM_USAGE_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T1.USAGE_AMT),0),'9,999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_USAGE_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T1.PEEK_QY),0),'999,999,999,990.00')) AS SUM_PEEK_QY FROM ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.USAGE_YR >= #sStartUsageYear#
AND T1.USAGE_YR <= #sEndUsageYear#
AND T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #sMngFeeFcltyCd#

SELECT /*+ INDEX (T2 PK_ELCTY_USAGE_STTUS_F) */ T1.USAGE_YR AS USAGE_YR ,NVL(SUM(T2.USAGE_QY),0) AS USAGE_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.USAGE_AMT),0) AS USAGE_AMT ,NVL(SUM(T2.PEEK_QY),0) AS PEEK_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_01_QY),0) AS MT_01_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_02_QY),0) AS MT_02_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_03_QY),0) AS MT_03_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_04_QY),0) AS MT_04_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_05_QY),0) AS MT_05_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_06_QY),0) AS MT_06_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_07_QY),0) AS MT_07_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_08_QY),0) AS MT_08_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_09_QY),0) AS MT_09_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_10_QY),0) AS MT_10_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_11_QY),0) AS MT_11_QY ,NVL(SUM(T2.MT_12_QY),0) AS MT_12_QY FROM ( SELECT #mngFeeFcltyCd# AS MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ,#mngFeeJobSe# AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')) - LEVEL + 1,'0000')) AS USAGE_YR FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F T2 ON (T1.USAGE_YR=T2.USAGE_YR AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AND T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD=T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD) GROUP BY T1.USAGE_YR ORDER BY T1.USAGE_YR

SELECT T1.USAGE_YR AS USAGE_YR ,NVL(T1.MT_01_QY,0) AS MT_01_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_02_QY,0) AS MT_02_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_03_QY,0) AS MT_03_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_04_QY,0) AS MT_04_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_05_QY,0) AS MT_05_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_06_QY,0) AS MT_06_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_07_QY,0) AS MT_07_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_08_QY,0) AS MT_08_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_09_QY,0) AS MT_09_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_10_QY,0) AS MT_10_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_11_QY,0) AS MT_11_QY ,NVL(T1.MT_12_QY,0) AS MT_12_QY FROM ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F T1 WHERE T1.USAGE_YR = #usageYr# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #mngFeeFcltyCd#

SELECT T1.USAGE_YR AS USAGE_YR ,NVL(T1.MT_01_AMT,0) AS MT_01_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_02_AMT,0) AS MT_02_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_03_AMT,0) AS MT_03_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_04_AMT,0) AS MT_04_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_05_AMT,0) AS MT_05_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_06_AMT,0) AS MT_06_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_07_AMT,0) AS MT_07_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_08_AMT,0) AS MT_08_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_09_AMT,0) AS MT_09_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_10_AMT,0) AS MT_10_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_11_AMT,0) AS MT_11_AMT ,NVL(T1.MT_12_AMT,0) AS MT_12_AMT FROM ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F T1 WHERE T1.USAGE_YR = #usageYr# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #mngFeeFcltyCd#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS YR_CNT ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#sUsageYear#,'YYYY'),-12),'YYYY') AS PREV_YR FROM ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F WHERE USAGE_YR = #sEndUsageYear#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F ( USAGE_YR ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ,USAGE_QY ,USAGE_AMT ,PEEK_QY ,MT_01_QY ,MT_02_QY ,MT_03_QY ,MT_04_QY ,MT_05_QY ,MT_06_QY ,MT_07_QY ,MT_08_QY ,MT_09_QY ,MT_10_QY ,MT_11_QY ,MT_12_QY ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ) SELECT #sEndUsageYear# ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ,NVL(USAGE_QY,0) ,NVL(USAGE_AMT,0) ,NVL(PEEK_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_01_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_02_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_03_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_04_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_05_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_06_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_07_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_08_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_09_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_10_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_11_QY,0) ,NVL(MT_12_QY,0) ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE FROM ELCTY_USAGE_QY_F WHERE USAGE_YR = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#sEndUsageYear#,'YYYY'),-12),'YYYY')
sqlMap.select: SELECT MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ,MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM FROM MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = 'E' ORDER BY MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM
